Name: Cursor-Kun
Story: I've noticed Bucketina-Chan doesn't seem to have too many friends. So, I suppose talking to her wouldn't hurt even if we don't go to the dance.

Name: Cursor-Kun
Story: I look down and gaze upon my chisled abs. I mean, with a body like this, I know for a fact I can woo her!

Name: Cursor-Kun
Story: As I approach her I notice something off.

Name: Cursor-Kun
Story: Her eyes are darting back and forth while she looks all around her desk.
